acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle Singletons with parameters in the static method
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleSingletonsWithParametersInPublicStaticMethod

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.SingletonWithParametersInStaticFactoryPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the calendar object should not be null
Then the String field jX40BxCNmP cannot be null or empty

Then the List<?> <span class='step-parameter'>[OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 105 byteObjectField = 16 shortField = 122 shortObjectField = 101 charField = C charObjectField = D intField = -764456665 intObjectField = -273154357 longField = 333525393722000 longObjectField = 333525393673091 floatField = 0.6990116 floatObjectField = 0.19473058 doubleField = 0.4038086729217619 doubleObjectField = 0.5513253496925062 stringField = 9KJP8v2o9a objectField = java.lang.Object@72b1ee4b calendarField = Sun Jun 21 21:03:09 BST 2015 dateField = Sun Jun 21 21:03:09 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@7fdd4b67 intArray = [I@4f21ed2d booleanArray = [Z@d0da1d6 bigDecimalField = 47331215936 ) should not be null and contain at least one non-empty element

Then the Map<?, ?> <span class='step-parameter'>{FyygvThtmM=OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 29 byteObjectField = 38 shortField = 84 shortObjectField = 90 charField = V charObjectField = A intField = 299182316 intObjectField = -1793174816 longField = 333525399216872 longObjectField = 333525399180849 floatField = 0.90576005 floatObjectField = 0.84575677 doubleField = 0.14250267746170253 doubleObjectField = 0.4671144320447713 stringField = yNPTxVffGe objectField = java.lang.Object@72b1ee4b calendarField = Sun Jun 21 21:03:09 BST 2015 dateField = Sun Jun 21 21:03:09 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@2181e6b6 intArray = [I@2cf1c10e booleanArray = [Z@4ad3f113 bigDecimalField = 47331215936 ) should contain at least one non empty element
